description: Nectarines, mint and watermelon make a cooling summer slushie you’ll enjoy again and again. Better yet, it’s ready in 5 minutes. Tropical umbrella optional.
keywords: Smoothie & frappé,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Summer,Stone fruit,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Watermelon,Peanut free
name: Nectarine, Mint & Watermelon Slushie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: handful mint leaves, reserve 4 leaves, to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Blitz together all ingredients in blender until slushie consistency and pour into serving glasses. Garnish each with a mint leaf and serve immediately.
